job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen, implementeren en onderhouden van schaalbare en veilige back-end oplossingen met behulp van ASP.NET Core en Python.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activities of building, deploying, and maintaining backend software, which falls under traditional software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwerpen en bouwen van RESTful API's voor integratie met verschillende front-end systemen.
job_tasks.justification: Designing and building APIs for integration is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating on design and adhering to software design principles (SOLID, MVC) are core software engineering activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Werken met Azure voor deployment, resource management en schaalbaarheid.
job_tasks.justification: Utilizing cloud services like Azure for deployment and resource management is part of the operational aspect of software delivery.

job_tasks.phrase: Bijdragen aan CI/CD-processen met GitHub Actions en versiebeheer met GitHub.
job_tasks.justification: Contributing to CI/CD pipelines and version control are key MLOps/DevOps practices for software deployment and management.

job_tasks.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
job_tasks.justification: Integrating backend services within a microservice architecture involves core software integration and development practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Samenwerken met andere ontwikkelaars en architecten om oplossingen te ontwerpen volgens SOLID- en MVC-principes.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions collaboration with other developers and architects.

soft_skills.phrase: Ondersteunen van cross-functionele teams bij het integreren van back-end diensten in een microservice architectuur.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates working with and supporting cross-functional teams.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional back-end software development tasks, including API design, integration, adherence to software principles (SOLID, MVC), cloud deployment, CI/CD, and microservices. There is no mention of AI, ML, GenAI, LLMs, or related specialized tasks or tools. Therefore, the role is classified as a Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing exclusively on traditional software engineering practices and technologies. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML components, making the classification straightforward.
